name: @langowarny/smartthings-mcp
description: Control SmartThings devices and scenes across your locations. Get live status and history, and send commands instantly. Automate routines by managing rooms, rules, schedules, and event subscriptions with real-time updates.

tools.name: create_room
tools.description: Create a new room in a SmartThings location

name.description: The name of the new room (e.g., 'Living Room', 'Office')

location_id.description: The unique identifier of the location to create room in

name.description: The name of the schedule (e.g., 'Morning Routine')

timezone.description: Timezone for the schedule (e.g., 'Asia/Seoul', 'UTC'). Defaults to UTC.

cron_expression.description: Cron expression for the schedule (e.g., '0 0 7 * * ?' for daily at 7 AM)

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

tools.name: create_subscription
tools.description: Create a subscription for device events

attribute.description: The attribute to monitor (e.g., switch, volume)

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device to subscribe to

capability.description: The capability to monitor (e.g., switch, audioVolume)

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

tools.name: delete_room
tools.description: Delete a room from a SmartThings location

room_id.description: The unique identifier of the room to delete

location_id.description: The unique identifier of the location

schedule_id.description: The unique identifier of the schedule to delete

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

subscription_id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription to delete

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

scene_id.description: The unique identifier of the scene to execute

tools.name: get_capability
tools.description: Get definition of a SmartThings capability

capability_id.description: The unique identifier of the capability (e.g., 'switch', 'audioVolume')

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device to retrieve (e.g., UUID)

tools.name: get_device_history
tools.description: Get recent event history for a device

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device to retrieve history for
The unique identifier of the device to check status for

tools.name: get_hub_health
tools.description: Get health status of a SmartThings hub

hub_id.description: The unique identifier of the hub

tools.name: list_device_capabilities
tools.description: List capabilities supported by a SmartThings device

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device to list capabilities for

location_id.description: Optional location ID to filter devices. If not provided, returns devices from all locations.

tools.name: list_rooms
tools.description: List rooms in a SmartThings location

location_id.description: The unique identifier of the location to list rooms for

tools.name: list_schedules
tools.description: List schedules for an installed app

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

tools.name: list_subscriptions
tools.description: List subscriptions for an installed app

installed_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the installed app

command.description: The command to execute (e.g., on, off, setVolume).

arguments.description: List of arguments for the command (e.g. [50] for setVolume). Optional.

component.description: The component ID (default: main). Use 'main' for most single-component devices.

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device to command

capability.description: The capability ID (e.g., switch, audioVolume). Must be supported by the device.
